author: DispatchDaemon
title: Vox Populi: 'To all those people protesting abortion on Abercorn: How many of you are willing to adopt unwanted babies?'
text:

Download your coupons now. “To all those people protesting abortion on Abercorn: How many of you are willing to adopt unwanted babies?”
“Hey mommy, you want to put that phone down and find out what is going on in the world outside your minivan?”
“Cruise ships don’t cause smoke, we need a cruise terminal!”
“The downtown merchants are the ones who stand to gain from the Ambassador Program and they should be the ones to pay for it, not the taxpayers.”
“Are there any farmer’s markets or supermarkets that sell North Georgia apples?”
“OK Chatham County Commission. It’s time to do something about that bully Yusuf Shabazz. Enough already!”
“Some of our politicians want to cut Social Security to people who worked and paid for it. Why not cut welfare given to those who didn’t work for it or pay anything to get it? And why not cut politicians pay while at it?”
“Instead of talking to choirs and congregations about violence, concerned pastors should travel as a group, talking directly to people in crime ridden neighborhoods and knocking on doors at local drug houses.”
